scripts.link-all: yarn link ../browser-tags-v2/packages/types/ && yarn link ../browser-tags-v2/packages/plp-styling/ && yarn link ../browser-tags-v2/packages/utilishared/ && yarn link ../browser-tags-v2/packages/performance-client/ && yarn link ../browser-tags-v2/packages/ui/ && yarn link ../browser-tags-v2/packages/js-ui/ && ln -fs ../../../browser-tags-v2/packages/plp-styling src/styling/plp-styling && LANG=C LC_CTYPE=C find ./src -type f ! -name '.DS_Store' -exec sed -i '' 's/@depict-ai\/plp-styling/\~\/styling\/plp-styling/g' {} +
scripts.unlink-all: yarn unlink ../browser-tags-v2/packages/js-ui/ && yarn unlink ../browser-tags-v2/packages/ui/ && yarn unlink ../browser-tags-v2/packages/performance-client/ && yarn unlink ../browser-tags-v2/packages/utilishared/ && yarn unlink ../browser-tags-v2/packages/plp-styling/ && yarn unlink ../browser-tags-v2/packages/types/ && rm src/styling/plp-styling && LANG=C LC_CTYPE=C find ./src -type f ! -name '.DS_Store' -exec sed -i '' 's/\~\/styling\/plp-styling/@depict-ai\/plp-styling/g' {} +
